item.title: Running the latest Linux kernel
item.description: When Meltdown and Spectre struck, it took Ubuntu a few days to release an updated kernel. It made me think if I could run the latest unmodified (vanilla) kernel from kernel.org and didn’t have to wait for the distribution to release their version.
